days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O Glorious Saint Lydwine, Christ chose you to suffer terrible chronic pain for poor sinners and to offer up all your sufferings to Him.
Intercede on our behalf and help us bear our small sufferings with fortitude, calling to mind your greater ones.
Grant us the grace to trust completely in Jesus, even during times of deep sorrow and pain.
Help us to always place our petitions in the hands of the Blessed Virgin Mary who on our behalf will offer up our petitions to Jesus as she graciously did for you.
Obtain for us the grace to persevere in sufferings until the Lord calls us home to enjoy the Glory of Heaven, and pray especially for the grace we ask in this novena (mention your request here…)
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
Saint Lydwine, whose life was filled with intense sufferings for poor sinners, pray for us!
